#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long ans;
int visited[100005];
pair <int,int> cost[100005];
vector<vector<int>> adj;
int f(int id)
{
	int mn = cost[id].first;
	visited[id]=1;
	for(int j=0;j<adj[id].size();++j)
	{
		if(visited[adj[id][j]]==0)
		{
		 visited[adj[id][j]]=1;
		 mn=min(mn, f(adj[id][j]));
		}
	}
	return mn;
}
int main()
{
	int i,j,k,t,n,m,tmp1,tmp2;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
		for(i=1;i<=n;++i)
		{
			scanf("%d",&cost[i].first);
			cost[i].second=i;
		}
		//sort(cost+1,cost+n+1);
		adj.clear();
		adj.resize(100005);
		for(i=0;i<m;++i)
		{
			scanf("%d%d",&tmp1,&tmp2);
			if(tmp1!=tmp2)
			{
				adj[tmp1].push_back(tmp2);
				adj[tmp2].push_back(tmp1);
			}
		}
		ans=0;
		memset(visited,0,sizeof(visited));
		for(i=1;i<=n;++i)
		{
			if(visited[i]==0)
				{
					//ans+=cost[i].first;
					ans+=f(cost[i].second);
				}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
return 0;
}
